Create an interactive game where players have to draw a dog and then the AI will judge their skills and give feedback on how to improve.
Develop a mobile app that allows users to take a photo of their dog and then use AI to create a digital drawing of the dog.
Create a social media campaign that encourages people to share photos of their dogs and then use AI to create a digital drawing of each dog.
Develop a virtual reality experience where users can interact with a dog and draw the dog in real-time.
Create an art exhibit that features digital drawings of dogs created by AI.
